elements.name: Create an account without providing mandatory fields

cells: You must register at least one phone number.
The Zip/Postal code you've entered is invalid. It must follow this format: 00000
This country requires you to choose a State.

elements.name: Validate Error message by providing invalid data in all the values

cells: The Zip/Postal code you've entered is invalid. It must follow this format: 00000
This country requires you to choose a State.

elements.name: Create an account by providing all the values

steps.name: I fill 'Date Of Birth' with value '20/1/1980'
I fill 'Additional Information' with value 'Looking for practice Automation'
I fill 'Address Alias' with value 'Bradford, UK'
I should be navigated to 'My account' page
Account name displayed is a combination of 'Athira' and 'Vivek'

elements.name: Create an account by providing only mandatory fields

steps.name: I should be navigated to 'My account' page
Account name displayed is a combination of 'Athira' and 'Vivek'

elements.name: See a store from West Palm Beach

steps.name: I should be able to scroll the map to see store near 'West Palm Beach'
User should be able to take screenshot

elements.name: Search Summer Dress from Navigation menu

steps.name: Hover over 'WOMEN' option from navigation menu
I Hover over 'Women' and click 'Summer Dresses'
I Hover over 'Women' and click 'Summer Dresses'
I change the 'Upper Limit' of slider to 20
I Hover over 'Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts' and click 'Add to cart'
An item with description name 'Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts' is available in Shopping cart summary

elements.name: Delete an item present in the basket

steps.name: Delete button should be displayed for the item 'Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts'
Click on Delete button of the item 'Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts'
Banner displays the message 'Your shopping cart is empty.'
